com.dor.coupons.system.tables

Interface CustomerRepo

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Customer,java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Customer,java.lang.Long>

    public interface CustomerRepo
extends org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Customer,java.lang.Long>

    This CustomerRepo is the basic way to communicate with the Customer table in the database.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Dor aharon

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void deleteCustomerByName(java.lang.String customer_name)
      This deleteCustomerByName delete a customer by given name from the database.
      boolean existsByName(java.lang.String name)
      This existsByName checks if a Customer object with the given name exists in the database.

      This existsByNameAndPassword checks if a Customer object with the given name and password exists in the database.
      Customer findCustomerByName(java.lang.String name)
      This findCustomerByName search for a customer object with the given name and if exists returns it.
      Coupon getCouponByTitleAndCustomerId(long customer_id, java.lang.String string)
      This getCouponByTitleAndCustomerId get Coupon object with the given coupon title that has been purchase by the customer with the given id.

      This getCouponsByTopPrice get collection of all Coupon objects whose price is lower or equal to a given price and have been purchased by the customer with the given id.

      This getCouponsByType get collection of all Coupon objects with the given coupon type that have been purchased by the customer with the given id.

    • Method Detail

      • findCustomerByName

        @Query(value="SELECT * FROM CUSTOMER WHERE name=?1",
       nativeQuery=true)
Customer findCustomerByName(java.lang.String name)
        This findCustomerByName search for a customer object with the given name and if exists returns it.
        Parameters:
        name - The given customer name you want to get from the database.
        Returns:
        Customer object with the given name.

      • existsByName

        boolean existsByName(java.lang.String name)
        This existsByName checks if a Customer object with the given name exists in the database.
        Parameters:
        name - The given customer name you want to check if exists in the database.
        Returns:
        Boolean of True if customer with the given name exists or false if not.

      • existsByNameAndPassword

        boolean existsByNameAndPassword(java.lang.String name,
                                java.lang.String password)

        This existsByNameAndPassword checks if a Customer object with the given name and password exists in the database.

        Mainly use in login method.

        Parameters:
        name - The given customer name you want to check if exists in the database.
        password - The given customer password you want to check if exists in the database.
        Returns:
        Boolean of true if customer with the given name and password exists or false if not.

      • deleteCustomerByName

        @Transactional
 @Modifying
 @Query(value="DELETE FROM CUSTOMER CUST WHERE CUST.name  = :customer_name")
void deleteCustomerByName(@Param(value="customer_name")
                                                                                                                                     java.lang.String customer_name)
        This deleteCustomerByName delete a customer by given name from the database.
        Parameters:
        customer_name - The name of the customer you want to delete from the database.

      • getCouponsByType

        @Query(value="SELECT coupon FROM CUSTOMER CUST INNER JOIN CUST.coupons AS coupon WHERE CUST.id = :customer_id AND coupon.type = :coupon_type")
java.util.Collection<Coupon> getCouponsByType(@Param(value="customer_id")
                                                                                                                                                                                              long customer_id,
                                                                                                                                                                                              @Param(value="coupon_type")
                                                                                                                                                                                              CouponType couponType)

        This getCouponsByType get collection of all Coupon objects with the given coupon type that have been purchased by the customer with the given id.

        Parameters:
        customer_id - The id of the customer that purchased the coupons.
        couponType - Enum of the coupons type you want to get from the database.
        Returns:
        Collection of all Coupon objects with the given coupon type that have been purchased by the customer with the given id

      • getCouponsByTopPrice

        @Query(value="SELECT coupon FROM CUSTOMER CUST INNER JOIN CUST.coupons AS coupon WHERE CUST.id = :customer_id AND coupon.price <= :coupon_price")
java.util.Collection<Coupon> getCouponsByTopPrice(@Param(value="customer_id")
                                                                                                                                                                                                     long customer_id,
                                                                                                                                                                                                     @Param(value="coupon_price")
                                                                                                                                                                                                     double price)

        This getCouponsByTopPrice get collection of all Coupon objects whose price is lower or equal to a given price and have been purchased by the customer with the given id.

        Parameters:
        customer_id - The id of the customer that purchased the coupons.
        coupon_price - The price limit of the coupons you want to get from the database.
        Returns:
        Collection of all Coupon objects whose price is lower or equal to a given price and have been purchased by the customer with the given id

      • getCouponByTitleAndCustomerId

        @Query(value="SELECT coupon FROM CUSTOMER CUST INNER JOIN CUST.coupons AS coupon WHERE CUST.id = :customer_id AND coupon.title = :coupon_title")
Coupon getCouponByTitleAndCustomerId(@Param(value="customer_id")
                                                                                                                                                                                       long customer_id,
                                                                                                                                                                                       @Param(value="coupon_title")
                                                                                                                                                                                       java.lang.String string)

        This getCouponByTitleAndCustomerId get Coupon object with the given coupon title that has been purchase by the customer with the given id.

        Parameters:
        customer_id - The id of the customer that the coupon has been purchase by him.
        coupon_title - The title of the coupon you want to get from the database.
        Returns:
        Coupon object with the given coupon title that the coupon has been purchase by him.
